mapper.select: SELECT d.ad_id as adId, n.nature as nature, d.disease_name as diseaseName, d.pathogeny, d.symptom, d.treatment, d.img_url as imgUrl FROM ad_animal_disease d left JOIN ad_nature n on d.n_id=n.n_id
SELECT a.disease_name as diseaseName, a.pathogeny, a.symptom, a.treatment FROM ad_animal_disease a WHERE MATCH (symptom) AGAINST ( #{data} IN NATURAL LANGUAGE MODE ) LIMIT 1
